reviews.text:
Amazing service with a very flexible and kind waiter. I believe his name was Gavin. Super helpful and patient with our large party.
On the other hand, the pizza was pretty average. We got a half sausage and half cheese pizza and a pepperoni pizza. They weren‚Äôt bad, but nothing was very flavorful. The salad wasn‚Äôt too great either. Not a lot of toppings and definitely not enough dressing.
Unfortunately, I would not recommend coming here. I believe there are better pizzas in the area.

Overall the food was good. They have Gluten Free 12" Pizzas ($16-17) which are good but pricey. If you like a thicker crust get the house crust. The service was quite bad overall with a couple bright spots. When we arrived we were the only ones in the dining area. By the time we left it was full. It's a smaller dining area than most restaurants but the waitress was pretty much non-existent. Drinks ran dry and she messed up an appetizer order.

I chalk it up to being young and inexperienced..A lady from the back area, maybe the bar area came around to help and was fantastic.

The parking lot is terrible and gets crazy full Friday nights so park in the second row or further if you don't want to feel like you're leaving a concert after dinner.

Overall 7/10.

We‚Äôve been coming to Little Italian for years and years. It‚Äôs our favorite place for pizza. We love the thin crust, but they also have deep dish for those who love that.  Ordering online is always easy and our pizza is always ready when they say it will be.

They have an amazing thin crust pizza! When we lived in Naperville, this was our go to place for thin crust pizza. We moved away about 8 years ago and went there because we were in the area. The pizza was fantastic! They remodeled the place so it looks very clean and welcoming. The staff was super friendly and we had an enjoyable dining experience. Definitely recommend it!

We have ordered pizza from Little Italian for many, many years.  It is consistently good.  We order thin crust with cheese, cheese and sausage, and veggies of mushroom-onion-green pepper.  Topping are fresh and generous.

editorial_summary.overview: Casual, family-friendly Italian spot for hearth-baked pizzas, pasta, sandwiches & classic entrees.

detailedReviews.text: Pizza is always consistently delicious. We order the king size thin crust 1/2 sausage 1/2 pepperoni extra sauce, well done and it was perfect. Sign up for the text messages, there is always a coupon or deal!

detailedReviews.author: Rudy Rodriguez Jr.
detailedReviews.text: This by far is our favorite pizza joint!

detailedReviews.author: Greg V
detailedReviews.text:
Great atmosphere & great staff! Hung out at the bar for drinks and some munchies. Good stuff!

If you haven't been here, you should give it a try!

detailedReviews.author: Ralph Lambka
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town! I've been a customer for 45 years. On the very rare occasion something goes wrong, they immediately make it right.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Nicholus
detailedReviews.text: Love this place - the food and staff are world class and right here in Naperville!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Wiers
detailedReviews.text: Great family run establishment! The server did an excellent job and was in charge of setting us all up and taking care of us all! We will be back again for sure!

detailedReviews.text: If you want a traditional pizza, this is the place to go.

detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Naperville, a must visit. Great service and great food!

detailedReviews.text: Hey love your food, but is there a way to order with less fees, want to order more than once a week.

detailedReviews.author: John Kubicki
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and pasta. Friendly family atmosphere. Will defenitely come back. Jess(Our waitress) was amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Agnos
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been coming here since I was a kid and it‚Äôs still the same old staple Naperville restaurant I crave when I‚Äôm out of town. The staff are friendly and treat you like family. How many pizza places within walking distance in the suburbs have a tiny bar in the middle where the bartender pours em strong and knows you by name?

detailedReviews.author: Raul Chaidez
detailedReviews.text: Great local pizza place. Awesome thin crust!! Fast friendly service. My go to!!

detailedReviews.text: Love the old school style taste of pizza üçï üòã, give them a chance, let me know your thoughts.

detailedReviews.text: They have great thin crust pizza. They put a ton of toppings on there pizzas

detailedReviews.author: David Wunderlich
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been a customer since 1979. It‚Äôs the Best pizza you can buy!

detailedReviews.author: Carol Cronin
detailedReviews.text: Always the Best pizza EVER!!!

detailedReviews.author: Via C
detailedReviews.text:
Amazing service with a very flexible and kind waiter. I believe his name was Gavin. Super helpful and patient with our large party.
On the other hand, the pizza was pretty average. We got a half sausage and half cheese pizza and a pepperoni pizza. They weren‚Äôt bad, but nothing was very flavorful. The salad wasn‚Äôt too great either. Not a lot of toppings and definitely not enough dressing.
Unfortunately, I would not recommend coming here. I believe there are better pizzas in the area.

detailedReviews.author: Rachael Sana Manzoor
detailedReviews.text: We absolutely love this place. They have good pizza, the absolute best chicken wings, and great adult beverage specials daily. The atmosphere is cozy and casual. It's incredibly kid-friendly; one of the few places I feel my children can actually be themselves at. But the best part of the place is the service and staff. it begins with a fantastic manager, PJ. He always makes sure every customer is satisfied, and is incredibly dedicated to supporting local schools and the community. Our two favorite servers are Gavin, and Jess. They are incredibly prompt, kind, and accommodating. My favorite thing is how they treat my children. They always make them feel happy and comfortable, which makes our night stress-free. Little Italian is also the best place to go for large parties and group gathering. They are incredibly accommodating, and can almost always offer you the space, even on relatively short notice. Once the bartender was our server, and delivered the same extraordinary customer experience, also paying special attention to my children, making our night fantastic and stress free.

detailedReviews.author: Gary Nass
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, fast service

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Sigale
detailedReviews.text: They hosted a private event for us and it was wonderful. Great pizza, great service and they worked with our groups timing and budget. I highly recommend them!

detailedReviews.author: Don Caprio
detailedReviews.text: Great food!

detailedReviews.author: Mike Briggs
detailedReviews.text: Hate to say the same thing, but‚Ä¶once again, the pizza was outstanding this evening!  Absolutely delicious!  I appreciate the consistency!

detailedReviews.author: George N (George N.)
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a pizza online the way I like it, the website ordering is the best I‚Äôve used and the pizza was made by pizza gods. Every bite was pizzafection. So so good.

detailedReviews.author: David Lewis
detailedReviews.text: The slice of pizza I ordered was not bad! I was told to try the $1 a wing special. Boy did they not disappoint on the wings!! It was a nice size wing with good amount of sauce and was cooked to perfection!!

detailedReviews.author: Barry Fitzpatrick
detailedReviews.text: Love little Italian pizza

detailedReviews.author: David C. Ziegler
detailedReviews.text: Almost, always a great place to go. The services received tonight from all of the staff were, once again, absolutely great! Even during a very busy time.

detailedReviews.author: John Fortunato
detailedReviews.text: The employees enrich the experience. Customer-attentive, professional and friendly. Bravo to the Little Italian team.

detailedReviews.author: Zach Johnson
detailedReviews.text:
We‚Äôve been ordering Little Italian Pizza since the 90‚Äôs. It is some of our favorite pizza in town.

We just had the 4 cheese with half sausage/half basil & spinach. Delicious.

detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around and fasted delivery i ever had

detailedReviews.author: Cher Williams
detailedReviews.text: So strange. I ordered delivery, says it was delivered, but no food. Haha. What the heck?

detailedReviews.author: Andy
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is okay, everything else is hit or miss. Ordered a plain burger, they ignored the plain part. Burgers are served on this weird french roll like bun thats super chewy, like something for an italian beef, not a great burger bun. Fries were undercooked and still hard, not crispy hard. Just a shame they cannot seem to handle busy evenings.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Wise
detailedReviews.text: Love this place! Best pizza in town!

detailedReviews.author: Carla Brinker
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!  üçï

detailedReviews.author: Laura Johnson
detailedReviews.text:
Excellent pizza.
Friendly experience.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Groves
detailedReviews.text: Best pie in the suburbs

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Puckett
detailedReviews.text: We LOVE Little Italian. My husband and I tried it on a whim a couple of years ago, and now this is the only pizza place in Naperville we will go to or order from. We always enjoy our experience and the wonderful food, both sitting down at the restaurant or ordering to go. We recently had a small gender reveal party here and all of our guests had a great time and raved about how good everything was, including the service. They were so helpful in accommodating our vision for this special gathering and executed the handling of our party flawlessly. Always looking forward to the next time we dine here.Thank you!!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Inserro
detailedReviews.text: Love the place. Excellent food and prices!!!

detailedReviews.author: Wade Cadwallader
detailedReviews.text: I've never felt more welcomed as an out-of-stater! Stop in an say hi to Pita - she's the greatest!

detailedReviews.author: Dave Laughlin
detailedReviews.text:
This is a neighborhood place that we frequent often because always consistent, food is great, service is great and on carry out it‚Äôs ready when they say it will be , Everyone has a smile and a kind word
Thanks Little Italian staff!!!

detailedReviews.author: ryan stanley
detailedReviews.text: Best bar pizza in town by far. Order it thin and well done and you will not be disappointed‚Ä¶

detailedReviews.author: Sharon Bastone
detailedReviews.text: Love you!! that's why I keep coming back

detailedReviews.author: Brian C
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been going to this place for decades . Whenever I come back to town I always stop here . Great food . Great people . Best wings in far west burbs . New owners are doing great . Staff is awesome.  If you use the restroom bring sunscreen and sunglasses. . Very bright!

detailedReviews.author: Laura Loehman
detailedReviews.text: Great place, great pizza. I really enjoy this restaurant/bar. Nice atmosphere with great food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Amber S
detailedReviews.text: Food poisoning. I have been going here for years and it was my favorite pizza place. Unfortunately, Saturday night I picked up pizza for dinner and my husband and I have been violently ill ever since. I called today to speak to the manager on duty, because it‚Äôs the first time I‚Äôve felt well enough to even make the phone call. I don‚Äôt want anyone else getting sick. He assured me everything is fresh and he‚Äôs had no other complaints and hung up. I‚Äôve been a customer for years and he didn‚Äôt even offer to refund me or try to make this right. I try to only post about positive experiences, but he doesn‚Äôt seem to be taking this seriously. Please beware of any meats or sausages from here for a bit.

detailedReviews.author: Armin Tamzarian
detailedReviews.text: Nice neighborhood restaurant. Pizza is better than the garbage chains, but still average.

detailedReviews.author: Nick Lonero
detailedReviews.text: Pizza always delicious

detailedReviews.author: Benja Navarro
detailedReviews.text: Buen servicio muy buena comida lo recomiendo

detailedReviews.author: Barbara Hile
detailedReviews.text: Our favorite pizza !!! House crust sausage and pepperoni üòäüòäüòãüòã

detailedReviews.author: Brian Filipowski
detailedReviews.text: Always a great place for tavern style pizza

detailedReviews.author: Rchardi Franckowiak
detailedReviews.text:
October 2024:  Delicious (Naperville) .  Wednesday is a winner. Hurricane  Milton may erase the pizzaria in Florida. {/end insert}. My future will include a trip to find real Chicago-style pizza at the Little Italian Pizza of Clearwater FL. It is a tribute to the legend that continues in Naperville.
Original post still true:: Remains faithful to quality and generous toppings. Delicious cold or reheated. Extra thin, crispy is our usual choice. Staying with conventional toppings.

detailedReviews.author: Larry McGraw
detailedReviews.text: Always a pleasure to be there. Service on point and Food great!!! Love going there

detailedReviews.author: Carol Moloney
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was outstanding!  Thanks so very much for our free lottery pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Steve Kashul
detailedReviews.text: Terrific pizza, love the house crust as well as the extra thin crust. Great owner and staff!

detailedReviews.author: Ra√∫l Vampi
detailedReviews.text: Su comida Me dio diarrea Por una semana y el Bar huele a pa√±ales sucios, limpien m√°s por favor

detailedReviews.author: Laura Fesus
detailedReviews.text: Love this place - one of our favorite neighborhood pizza nights -  Pita is the best!

detailedReviews.author: GT
detailedReviews.text: Great restaurant and close to home. Best pizza around and we have tried them all. Go here and you will not be disappointed. The staff actually CARES about your experience here. They have a little bar off to the side in case you are thirsty as well and of course you can order anything on the restaurant menu and it's available there as well. All around great place!

detailedReviews.author: Jeanne Garrod
detailedReviews.text: Hidden gem!  If  I could have given them more than 5 stars, I would have.  I hosted an event at Little Italian Pizza and, since my first conversation with PJ, I was very impressed.  We went back and forth a few times in email to make sure we had everything we needed and he also called me right before the event to check in. The restaurant is beautiful.  There is a lot of charm from the moment you walk in the door.  PJ and our waiter, Gavin came out to greet me as soon as I walked in and were there to assist us with anything we needed.  I haven't even mentioned the pizza yet, which was delicious.  It came out hot and it was the best pizza I've had in a really long time.  I will be back again with my family and will definitely host another here as well.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the pizza's perfect thin crust and generous, fresh toppings, making it a standout choice for pizza lovers. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The restaurant's long-standing reputation in Naperville, with over 50 years of consistently good pizza, is a testament to its quality and reliability. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
Customers appreciate the ease of online ordering and timely readiness of their orders, enhancing the convenience factor. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues related to food quality and customer service (e.g., food poisoning, average pizza, poor handling of complaints) - review management can address this concern
Poor handling of delivery orders and customer service (e.g., missing delivery, unresponsive management) - review management can address this concern
Competition and discovery issues (e.g., customers believe there are better pizzas in the area) - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
